item.title: Download real-time crypto market data from CoinMarketCap.com into a CSV file with midas
item.description: Sometimes it could be handy to have a CSV file of your crypto portfolio with the current prices provided by CoinMarketcCap.com. In this post, Iâ€™ll show you how to get this easily done by using an open source tool called midas. Preparation Before we can start setting up our CSV portfolio, we have to take care of some ingredients. The first thing we need to do is to create a CSV file that contains the names of the coins we want to have in our portfolio file.
